<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Opportune Backstab](/Feats.aspx?ID=4954) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 174 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Red Mantis Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=271) (Level 10)

**Trigger**
A creature within your melee reach is hit by a melee attack from one of your allies

</column>

---

When your enemy is hit by your ally, you capitalize upon the distraction. Make a Strike against the triggering creature.
name: Opportune Backstab
